rules.description: Left Command Key → { if tapped.
Right Command Key → Almost Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧) if held, } if tapped.
Post Esc if Caps is tapped, Control if held.
Anan's Space Layer: Check Documentation
Change right_command + u/i/o/p/h/j/k/l to navigation commands
Disable incorrect shift + letter combos
Shift_L tap -> '(', Shift_R tap -> ')'
Change Caps Lock to Esc when tapped and Ctrl when held.
Change Tab to Tab when tapped and Option when held.
Change Left Command to { when tapped and Left Command when held.
Change Right Command to } when tapped and Meh when held.
Change Right Option to Caps Lock
Change Shifts to parentheses.
f-mode for delimeters and ! ` #
d-mode for arithmetic and quotes
s-mode for dragon and @ $ &
a-mode for hjkl movement and ,. PageDn/Up
r-mode for deleting characters with ui, words with jk and lines with hl
e-mode allows for easy back and forth one character, word or line
w-mode = e-mode + SHIFT (i.e. selection, not just movement)
c-mode for number pad
